title: Unpopular Opinions
body:
Basically, state your opinions that may be considered unpopular. About League of Legends.

I think Miss Fortune would be more attractive with more clothes.

replies.body:
Miss Fortune has disgustingly huge tits.
I know this is a game of fantasy with magical creatures and stuff, but her waist-to-boobs ratio is jarringly unrealistic. As long as people under 16 play this game (still developing body-image psychology), I second the opinion that NO female champion should be dressed provocatively, and wearing high-heels in battle? Come on. Further, Elise and Zyra stand out to me as champions that Riot really went out of their way to sexualize. I really was not expecting the Spider Monster or the Plant Monster to have ridiculous mammalian features.
On a slightly related note, I would request another Female Non-Humanoid Champion.
I believe the Void offers plenty of opportunity there.
I'm in the camp of "the Voidborn don't have genders".

Unfortunately, Riot ruined that by referring to all of them as "he" in lore. (I'd just have referred to all of them as "she" to screw with people's minds a bit. Also, according to Terran life, Koggles' mommy would be much more terrifying trying to protect him than his daddy.)
Don't forget Morgana's waist. Or lack of one. It's honestly creepy, not sure if that was the intent. Also, a lot of the sexpot female champions try too hard in their VO.
I don't think there's a problem with provocative dress. I do think there's a problem with unreasonable body proportions. Morgana is not a body shape *anybody* should aspire to be.
New Sona is better.

I'm in the same boat on this one. :3 

(I played Sona almost exclusively Season 3, and I have to say, I like playing her a whole lot more now.)
I... I have never heard that phrase. I will be using this every chance I can get. Thank you for this. <3
and now we need a new less agressive support to go live (as pre rework sona was one of the better choice when your where on a streak of bad decision making to just relax while playing) :P
Janna :)
Nice, now we only need one that is even remotely on par with other supports.

I love Janna as she is, if your good with her nobody can kill your adc
Unless your tristana thinks your supposed to rocket jump into melee range of fed warwick

Personaly, the fact that most of her effects are timed/indirect means that you have to put in a lot more effort to obtain little to nothing more than other supports. If you shield at the wrong time, or the person you're trying to shield us uncooperative/not on the same track, a lot of that power may very well be wasted. Additionally, its effect is bonus AD, which requires to be actually used.

Next, she has an haste/slow with minimal damages. Slow on a support, unless it'S a stupid 80% slow, really requires coordination to be able to get something good out of it.

Her ult is insane, but only if your teammates think about actually using it. Also, I feel that a great Janna ult simply doesn't feel as rewarding as a great Nami ult, or Morgana Ult (or like Amumu/Galio/etc.).

Lastly, her one true saving grace is her tornado, but then again the skill cap is insanely high, and it doesn'T feel much more oppresive than Leona's stuns or Thresh's Hook or Braum's Q+passive and other examples like that.

One of the things I would really love for Janna is to, at the very least, lower her mana ratios or promote good usage of ksils by refunding aman in certain circumstances. I also feel like her W feels pretty lackluster since that self-MS boost is seldom as useful as, let's say, Sona's AoE MS boost.

I love how none of the new Sona haters are here

Sona's new kit was what she needed to revitalize her in this meta/season.

Nah, I assure you they're here. They are likely respecting this as a place for those of unpopular opinions to feel safe as I think the OP intended for it to be, or at least that's my view as someone who followed and strongly advocated against the Sona changes.

Female champions shouldn't be so revealing (or at least some of them shouldn't have freakin' perfect bodies and barely any clothes). Also, there should be more hot dudes (like Jayce) to balance the number of hot males and hot females. Yes, I am a straight girl. I need some attractive dude champions. Hahah.

Jayce is not hot.

There are like two humanoid male champios that might perhaps occur in real life (Ezreal, Varus), and Ez is ugly like hell. Seriously, Vel'Koz is the most attractive male champion in the game.

I'm bi, and I just want a male counterpoint to the hotness that is Leona/Vi/Diana.
I thought Yasuo was supposed to be an attractive male? I remember part of his design was to be shirtless to appeal to some female Rioters, I could be mistaken though
Too buff and wide-shoudered, I don't think he looks much like a realistic human. Then again, my preference is for cute, androgynous-ish guys.

Hm....Lucian? Twisted Fate? DRAAAAAVENN????

Idk, Ezreal is the only young male type champion, but you don't like him, so...
Totally forgot about TF :P Lucian and Draven are in the category of too wide-shouldered.

Lucian too? Dang you're into some skinny dudes :P

What about....Fiddlesticks, lawl

He's a scarecrow :P

Also, why are my comments being downvoted? ._. Can't a girl express desire for non-muscular guys without beind downvoted?

Let's make a summary of your posts up to now :

1.  Somehow, there are only 2 male champions that could exist in real life, out of which one is semi-human.

2. Yasuo is too muscular to feel real. (NB. As a small huint, Snoopeh is much more fit than YAsuo, but I guess snoopeh is just a LoL persona, he must be slimmer irl... /sarcasm).

3. Lucian, aka the 4-pounders, is too broad of shoulder.

4. QQ I'm getting downvote for *no* reason.

5. First post that makes sense


So yeah, that's why you're getting downvoted... TherE's a difference between an unpopular opinion and a bad one. Saying that violence is good is an unpopular yet justifiable opinion, saying that someone being violated should feel happy that he's picked among others (and thus more popular) is a bad opinion.

A bad opinion? Is there such a thing? Sure you can think an opinion is bad, but that's YOUR opinion.

You're also taking her posts out of context.

> There are like two humanoid male champios that might perhaps occur in real life

She means what you're realistically gonna find if you look around at the average guy. She's not saying being a perfect Adonis is impossible, just that it isn't something that *might occur in real life*.

When she mentions people who are too broad of shoulder, she doesn't mean in general, she means their shoulders are too broad for her tastes. As she said, she prefers more androgynous guys

*P.S. Chill out, no need to get upset over someone's personal preferences*
Thanks. :)

I dunno, maybe you upset some Jayce/Yasuo fans. I upvoted them back to 1

Champions are supposed to be fighters, so most of them are naturally muscular, aside from like, Fiddlesticks....Karthus....and the Yordles...lol. Maybe Talon or Xin Zhao, but again probably too muscular for your taste

Ty :)

Yeah, thing is, I feel like Lucian would probably be the muscular extreme (most men would be less muscular) so the fighters/tanks should have about that level of muscle and the squishies should look slimmer. What need does a long-range mage have for huge biceps?

I could probably talk for hours about how League needs more skinny dudes, muscular women (especially tanks/fighters), female monsters, and less high heels.

Lucian just seems like the athletic type to me (I think that's why he got the world cup skin). I mean, sure most men are less muscular than Lucian, but most men are not professional athletes either. League champions are supposed to be the best of the best in Runeterra.

But yea, I do agree that like, Malzahar/Ryze/etc are awkwardly muscular (I mean, Ryze is kind of a fighter, but he doesn't punch people, so...). Zed is strangely beefy for a ninja. 

Master Yi is pretty slim. I always thought Leona/Riven/Vi/etc were too skinny for the weapon/shield they're using (especially in A New Dawn, Leona's arms are freaking tiny).

What about Urgot? ;P
Runes shouldn't be in the game, or at least have their prices slashed so it isn't one and a half or all the way to 2 weeks of games for a champion and enough runes for said champion.
I'm lucky to get that much.

1.) Viktor is the most fun/rewarding AP mid character, and i'm not even good at him. Death Ray is one of coolest skills in the game - a skill shot for real men (or women).

2.) Battle Bunny Riven is the dumbest skin in the game - using it just ruins an otherwise really cool character.

3.) Shen's kit/playstyle makes absolutely no sense with a ninja paradigm - compared to the other ninjas, nothing about what he does except maybe the taunt have anything to do with being the "eye of twilight". His "Warlord Shen" skin is MUCH closer to representing the character his kit/play pattern actually implies.

1.  I think Hurricane is actually a good item for ADCs under certain conditions
2.  I like Essence Reaver in general, but I think the last buff kind of hurt it a little.  
3.  Soraka should have been reworked as a battlemage
I think {{item:3085}} is good for {{champion:51}} .

Lee Sin is balanced

Just don't give away my hiding spot :P
Actually I am pretty sure he is underpowered now.  His win rate way dropped after that nerf.  I didn't realize the as debuff was that big a deal for his invade.

Master Yi requires skill in order to play it at certain levels of game.
I am saying this because at the beginning no one considers CC and focus so he is considered OP by the newbier players, but for higher elo players master yi can be a challenge to play in mid/late game since they need to flank the enemy team and avoid all possible focus and CC. All of this by having a skillset composed primarly by tools that does not favor feat of skills.

I think Dota 2's camera is way too close, as most skill shots go way off screen when camera is centered on your champion.

This wasn't just about LoL opinions, was it?
Just LoL opinions.

Sounds like my opinion is unpopular with you. I win.

Ok, jokes over.

I think Blitzcranks Elongated High-Five/Brofist should have a wind up time, just like Thresh's Death Sentence. A Blitz getting ahold of you (especially if you're a squishy support) is usually far more dangerous than Thresh getting you, yet Blitz can do it easier anyway :(
No female champion should wear heels or be dressed revealingly.

Heels are stupid, I agree. Never got the appeal, and just overall impractical. Revealing outfits work for most champions that have them, though they could stand to be toned down a little. (Zyra, Evelynn, Shyvana, Nid)

Tristana, kogmaw, nidalee, and gnar are not broken.

They are strong, a bit too much, but not broken op.
